disperse.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if a group of people disperse or are dispersed, they go away in different directions
disperse.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Police used tear gas to disperse the crowd.
disperse.translation[0].definitions[1].d: if something disperses or is dispersed, it spreads in different directions over a wide area
disperse.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The clouds dispersed as quickly as they had gathered.
